definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: The female of the species is more deadly than the male.
sentences.chinese: 这个物种的雌性比雄性更能致人死命。

sentences.english: A knife can be a deadly weapon.
sentences.chinese: 一把餐刀都可能是个致人死命武器。

sentences.english: Only Siming even here, but also from the dead to find, health significance.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕这里只有死命，也要从死亡中寻找，生的意义。

sentences.english: Ricin can cause death from exposure to as little as a pinhead amount.
sentences.chinese: 只要针头大小的药量，蓖麻毒素就可以致人死命。

sentences.english: That is probably quite a deadly wheel.
sentences.chinese: 也许那是一个致人死命的轮子。

sentences.english: Bush vigorous, much branching, roots most resistant to Armillaria , tolerates some dryness.
sentences.chinese: 布什旺盛，分枝多，根系最耐蜜，致人死命有些干燥。

sentences.english: Hothouse plants do not possess exuberant vitality.
sentences.chinese: 温室里的花卉没有会有强除夜的死命力。

sentences.english: If the stone and others after being pursued.
sentences.chinese: 苟金石等人在后死命追赶。

sentences.english: Mild electric shock to human body, but continued strong shock can death-dealing .
sentences.chinese: 稍微的电击对人体无碍，但强电击却可以致人死命。

sentences.english: I got sick and tired of learning boring grammar rules and lifeless word.
sentences.chinese: 我厌倦凉建无聊的语法规则战出有死命的单词。

sentences.english: High blood pressure is a killer.

definition: all one's strength/with might and main
to do one's utmost/with all one's might/at all costs/(to work or fight) as if one's life depends on it
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
to go mad/to go crazy/to lose one's mind
lit. to bite the teeth tightly (idiom); fig. to grit one's teeth and bear the pain/to bite the bullet
to relinquish one's grip/to let go
